meanings.definition: The extent and rate at which a substance can be absorbed and used by the body.
meanings.sent1: The bioavailability of the vitamin supplement determines how much the body can absorb.
meanings.sent2: Doctors consider the bioavailability of medications when prescribing them to patients.
meanings.sent3: The bioavailability of the energy drink was so high that it seemed to give the person superpowers!
meanings.sent4: In the world of nutrition, bioavailability is like a key that unlocks the body's ability to benefit from nutrients.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the bioavailability of different foods can help in creating a balanced diet.
